Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Holland
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cermak-McCormick Place
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at at Cermak-McCormick Place due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at at Cermak-McCormick Place due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line trains bypassing Cermak-McCormick Place
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cermak-McCormick Place due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cermak-McCormick Place due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes such as #3 King Drive route, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
